# mssql_user (Resource)

The `mssql_user` resource manages users on a database on MSSQL server.


<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `database` (String) Database name where the user will be created.
- `name` (String) User name.

### Optional

- `login` (String) Login name to map the user to.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) User identifier.

## Example Usage

```
resource "mssql_user" "userexample" {
  name     = "example_user"
  database = "testdb"
  login    = "test_login"
}
```
